name: Clash of war!
description:
Lock and load!
Clash of war - a highly addictive and action packed game that fills your device with unlimited action.
Defeat the bad guys and finish each levels and earn new vehicles along the way,
each vehicle has its own pros and cons and you can choose from over 30 vehicles.

EARNINGS
* Special power ups
* Shields
* New armour
* Grenade launcher
* Extra lives

FEATURES
* Over 30+ vehicles. Tanks, helicopters, jetfighters and bunch of real special ones!
* Unlimited missions
* Different sceneries with different settings
* Bonus missions.
* Special attacks. Like airstrikes, artillery and support troops!
* Over 20 Achievements
* Lots, lots and lots of explosions!

NO IN APP PURCHASES - Grab yourself a real bargain today

Highly retro game for those who are into action packed war games with lots of explosions

Clash of war - get it right now!
